name: @nicolaygerold/pluck
description: LLM-native HTML selector library. Extract data with XPath and CSS.
author: Nicolay Gerold

scripts.check:all: bun test && bun run lint && bun run format:check
scripts.check:fix: oxfmt src tests && oxlint --fix src tests && bun test
scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node && bun run build:types
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/index.cjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run build:cjs
